data.text: @MarkusRiva Morning!! 💚👋🏻

@giuly229 Good evening! You will need your vaccination certificate and fill out the form via https://t.co/cqgpKUFmRq.
However as your flight is still few weeks away, please double check this closer to the departure date. More details: https://t.co/3bGziMdKjA

Baltic Outlook September issue is available on board of our flights! Enjoy our story about Tenerife, an island of never-ending spring, or learn more about the gorgeous French actress @OfficialMarceau in an exclusive interview. Digital version available 👉 https://t.co/8HNJ47VvmU https://t.co/iHePrXBjzA

@ZKoi5 @LubetskyPete Labvakar! Šis jautājums jau būs konkrētās laboratorijas kompetencē (cik ilgā laikā ir iespējams saņemt testa rezultātu).

airBaltic's new #NFT collection is live! Edition 5 NFTs are showcasing Bauska #cryptoart and have been issued on OpenSea marketplace for a fixed price of 0.01 Ether. A total of 10 new unique collectibles can be purchased now: https://t.co/YjsB3Jnyyr https://t.co/3T1UyRStix

data.text: @Mariosa_Com Good morning! Please DM us privately with more details - your booking reference number as well as screenshot with the precise information which is being entered and the error you see, we will check this!

data.text: @tovezilliacus Hello! We do offer such flights with connection in Riga! For currently actual flight schedule we kindly invite you to visit our home page https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg! 😊 Thank you.

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @FootballOrganic Hello! Please be informed that the said document is valid for being presented before your flight until September 1st, 2021. After the mentioned date only EU digital certificate (with few exceptions) will be accepted. More details: https://t.co/3bGziMdKjA
@kungavsand_ Informējam, ka nepieciešamo dokumentu savlaicīga iesūtīšana pārbaudei pirms lidojuma nav obligāta. Tomēr, aicinām ņemt vērā, ka tie būs jāuzrāda pirms iekāpšanas Jūsu reisā. Paldies.

@kungavsand_ Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Ja domājat mūsu airBaltic Club aplikāciju, tad varam apstiprināt, ka informācija par tās darbības traucējumiem ir nodota mūsu tehniskā atbalsta departamentam. Pateicamies jau iepriekš par sapratni.
@AivarsTennisUK Thanks for flying with us! See you on board again soon! 💚

Friday is here and so is our #airBalticQuiz! Last weekend we were excited to add another plane to our #A220 family. It made its way directly to us from Montreal, Canada. ✈️ 🇨🇦
Question - how many kilometres it approximately takes for the trip from Canada to Latvia? 📍

According to unaudited consolidated financial results for the first six months of 2021, @airBaltic group managed to reduce its net loss three times compared to 2020, amounting to EUR 61.5 million. Read more: https://t.co/NKbLnF7lxS https://t.co/4ZBxHp8TGW
@IlzeJece Labvakar, Ilze! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu! Jauki dzirdēt par šādu lidojuma pieredzi - ar prieku nodosim kolēģiem Jūsu atsauksmi. Vēlam tikpat patīkamus lidojumus ar mums arī turpmāk!
@DigiPapucis Labdien! Sīkākas detaļas par lidojuma maiņas noteikumiem atrodamas mūsu mājaslapā: https://t.co/basVOR72sh

urls.title: Mainīt lidojumu - Izmaiņas ceļojumā | airBaltic
urls.description: Ir labi būt vienmēr gatavam, tomēr ne vienmēr varam paredzēt savus ceļošanas plānus, un, ja ir gadījies būt mazliet vieglprātīgam, ir arī papildu iespējas.

data.text: @LetteRuuta Labdien! Šis jautājums būs lidostas drošības dienestu kompetencē - taču domājam, ka ar koka adāmadatām problēmām nevajadzētu būt. Sīkākas detaļas par aizliegto priekšmetu sarakstu: https://t.co/nlj9GYBHB2

@JulzBirdie Hi! Sorry to hear about such situation. We would like to remind that GREEN classic include other services as well such as seat selection, baggage, airport check-in, passenger name change possibilities and others. However we understand concern, we will pass this to our colleagues.

#DidYouKnow that our Pilot Academy’s students are flying the Diamond 40 and Diamond 42 aircraft which are the greenest, most efficient, most modern aircraft of their type in the industry? https://t.co/rHkTPjN1t7

We believe that satisfied and happy customers are one of the key drivers of business success and growth. We have published new Customer Service Commitment - this is another step to improve @airBaltic customer service. Read more: https://t.co/5rNiPpDR0U https://t.co/Pl2tjVeTZn
@honeyhoda @helvettia Good morning! Please check your DMs!

Our Green Sale is here! Wrap up this summer with a vacation or plan your autumn getaway now cause flights to all airBaltic destinations are available at their lowest prices: https://t.co/PHFITPyvQY
Book 💻 24.08.2021.-07.09.2021.
Fly ✈️ 06.09.2021.-26.03.2022. https://t.co/duy0ROzBqE

data.text: In July 2021, we carried 209 146 passengers, or 38% more than during the same period last year. Last month we performed 2 559 flights in total: https://t.co/1KLfXU8LSs https://t.co/FFnhbL9B8N

@savaadaak Labdien! No airBaltic puses varam apliecināt, ka šķietamā pavadzīme nav īsta. Uzņēmums nav iepircis un neplāno iepirkt vakcīnas. Lai noskaidrotu viltotās pavadzīmes izcelsmi, airBaltic izvērtēs iespēju vērsties tiesībsargājošajās iestādēs. Paldies.

@giuliasan__ Hello! Yes - document must be issued within EU/EEA/Switzerland/UK and has to confirm the completion of vaccination or recovery from the disease. For more details please visit: https://t.co/3bGziMdKjA
Thank you.

It has been an honor to operate the Baltic country flag motive fleet for already two years 🇱🇻 🇱🇹 🇪🇪 It was first revealed in the 30th anniversary of the Baltic Way and it continues to carry the Baltic unity in the skies! https://t.co/0BHMBGFhue

For us A B C is not as easy as 1 2 3, because YL-ABC is already the fourth @Airbus A220-300 aircraft we’ve received this year! We can’t wait for three more to join our fleet in 2021 to continuously offer our passengers a brand new aircraft experience! ✈️ https://t.co/CGIkGBbrpV

data.text: @laabiniex Labdien! Jā, tas ir iespējams, taču tikai sazinoties ar mums. Vai varam lūgt DM ziņā privāti atsūtīt Jūsu rezervācijas detaļas - rezervācijas numuru, pasažieru vārdus, lidojuma maršrutu, kā arī pašreizējo, un jauno e-pasta adresi? Paldies!

@murniecelinda Labdien! Ja ģitāras lielums pārsniedz 80x40x23 cm (max. atļautais lielums spec. rokas bagāžai), mūzikas instrumenti tiek pieņemti pārvadāšanai salonā, ja tiem ir iegādāta speciāla biļete (cena atkarīga no vietu pieejamības), un aizņem papildus pasažiera sēdvietu.

@rence9 Labdien! Tehn. iemeslu dēļ šorīt tika atcelts reiss Berlīne - Rīga. Lai savlaicīgi visus ietekmētos pasažierus no Berlīnes nogādātu galamērķī, tika pieņemts lēmums veikt trijstūra veida lidojumu no Minhenes līdz Berlīnei, un tālāk uz Rīgu. Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām.
@tomasslakotko1 Paldies, arī Jums! 💚

@tomasslakotko1 Mūsu kolēģi šobrīd ir diezgan noslogoti, tāpēc varam aicināt mēģināt vēlreiz nedaudz vēlāk, vai rīt agri no rīta. Tāpat ar šo jautājumu ir iespējams vērsties arī pie reģistrācijas galdiņa, ja, piemēram, lidojiet jau rīt!

@tomasslakotko1 Labvakar! Caur Twitter šajā situācijā padomu dot nevarēsim, tāpēc aicinām sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu par iespējām: 
https://t.co/CHGjV15S1F

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text: @KayleighL000 If you cancelled the payment link, your originally booked flights will remain.

Lai kompensētu Covid-19 pandēmijas radītos zaudējumus un veicinātu ekonomiskās krīzes pārvarēšanu, valdība kā lidsabiedrības vairākuma akcionārs atbalstījusi airBaltic pamatkapitāla palielināšanu par 90 miljoniem eiro: https://t.co/24DmgkiOA6 https://t.co/YcmecVNCIv

To compensate the losses caused by the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic and support overcoming of the economic crisis, the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Latvia has approved the investment of EUR 90 million into the equity of airBaltic: https://t.co/pLrpWNPXxr https://t.co/LX0k8IqCHi

data.text: @AMFlyest Correct! If you still experience issues after this, please get in touch with our colleagues at airBaltic Club, they will advise: https://t.co/RxUMDpSxxa
@AMFlyest Points can be retro-claimed no earlier than 7 days after the flight, therefore, if they were just few days ago, this may not be possible just yet.

@AMFlyest Please also note that points can be retro claimed within 6 months after the flight date. For newly enrolled members, points can be registered for journeys that took place up to 30 days before registering for the program.

@AMFlyest May we ask, how old are the booking references (flights in them)? Were the tickets booked on https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg or different website, as sometimes travel agencies tend to issue their own booking reference numbers.

@realNepareizais airBaltic izpilda lidojumus atbilstoši atbildīgo iestāžu noteiktajiem ierobežojumiem. Pašlaik ES lidsabiedrībām lidojumi Baltkrievijā ir aizliegti. Uzņēmums regulāri pārskata tā lidojumu grafiku, un lidojumus šajā maršrutā neveiks, ja aizliegums joprojām būs spēkā.

@sanderson35 Good morning! Flights for this destination are currently scheduled only this season as we are still working on the next summer's schedule. There should be news in this regard in the upcoming months. Thank you!
@tomasslakotko1 Labvakar! Pieļaujam, ka tehnisks iemesls, kāpēc sistēmā nu biļetes klase uzrādās cita. Aicinām sazināties ar mūsu kolēģiem pa tālruni: +371 6700 6006, tiks veikts labojums!

@agneseblu Pēc mūsu šī brīža rīcībā esošās informācijas Norvēģijas zaļajā sarakstā atrodās arī Latvija, kas nozīmētu, ka Covid-19 tests ieceļojot nav nepieciešams, taču, tā kā šis saraksts un valsts ieceļošanas nosacījumi var manīties, aicinām to vēlreiz pārbaudīt ar konkr. valsts iestādēm.

data.text: @agneseblu Vai varam lūgt, kāds ir Jūsu plānotais lidojuma maršruts, un par kuru valsti ir runa? Paldies!

@agneseblu Labdien! Valstu noteikumi šobrīd mainās ļoti bieži (dažkārt pat vairākas reizes dienas laikā), tāpēc visa informācija mūsu mājaslapā varētu nebūt arī atjaunota. Ja konkrētā valsts Jums testu, vai sertifikātu neprasa atbilstoši šī brīža noteikumiem, tas nebūs nepieciešams.
@drareg59 You may be right! 😎

Wow, the activity on this quiz makes us believe we have a lot of frequent flyers! The majority has a good eye - on our standard flights we do indeed have a crew of 5 people! 
Two pilots and three flight attendands to ensure you have a safe and pleasant flight! 🤗

Accepting a brand new aircraft is always a thrilling experience! On August 15, our crew delivered a new addition to our fleet directly from Canada to @riga_airport. Our 28th @Airbus A220-300 welcomes passengers with registration YL-ABB ✈️ https://t.co/3U3haQjukV

data.text: @adamrangpr Good morning! Thanks for reaching out to us. Looks like a technical issue (if indeed no additional services are chosen). Please DM us privately more details such as your booking reference number, we will pass this to our team.

@Evelyna_L @PTACgovLV Labvakar! Atvainojamies par šo nepatīkamo situāciju. Retos gadījumos šāda maiņa var notikt operacionālu iemeslu, vai sistēmas kļūdas dēļ. Ja sēdvietā, ko iegādājāties lidojuma laikā nesēdējāt, lūdzam mums rakstīt iesniegumu: https://t.co/Y5ZBQN2LCT

data.text: @Bellissimoshirt Hello! If you are fully vaccinated (+15 days passed since receiving the last dose) and you have a valid vaccination certificated issued in the EU/UK/CH or EEA country, PCR test is not needed, as according to current entry requirements. You also need to submit an online form (1/2)
@matchaontoast Good evening! Please check your DMs!

@bhaaskara Good morning! We kindly ask you to send us direct message here on Twitter with more details (as exactly which flights are chosen), as well as screenshots with possible error messages you see. Thank you!
#DidYouKnow that this year we were awarded the Silver Category in Sustainability Index by the Institute for Corporate Sustainability and Responsibility in Latvia? https://t.co/1j9JraSLI3
@ufomedia Good morning and thanks for informing us. We will pass your tweet to responsible colleagues.

@james_ellis12 Our apologies for this unpleasant situation. We will do everything we can to transport as many bikes as possible in the particular flight. Due to limited space all the remaining bikes will be transported to destination with all the other possible flights as soon as possible.

First multi engine flight is a serious milestone in every pilot’s career – it signifies hard work and training to master the profession. @mxdeblack Labvakar! Paldies par interesi. Informējam, ka šodien ar reisa numuru BT7701 Liepājas lidostā nosēdās čarterreiss Rīga-Liepāja.

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.

data.text:
Let’s get quizical! 💪🏻🧠 This Friday for our #airBalticQuiz we want to find out if you enjoy random fun facts as much as we do! 
What’s the reason why water salutes are given to aircraft?

@CoastalRunner79 @TLLairport @Gatwick_Airport Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. Please accept our sincere regrets for the inconveniences caused. By the information currently available to us, all of the baggages have reached Tallinn airport. For more details we invite you to contact the Lost and Found office. Thank you.

@EuSou0Batman @riga_airport Hello! As it is mentioned in our job advertisement, we are requiring our candidates to be fluent in Latvian, Russian and English languages. For more details please visit the provided link. Thank you!

We are building a new passenger handling team to provide support for our passengers in @riga_airport. If you have excellent customer service skills, a positive attitude, and a detail-oriented personality, apply and start a rewarding professional pathway: https://t.co/ae5CiDa5jK https://t.co/Cq0qVkEC2s
#DidYouKnow that our technical department does most of its work at night and day shifts are more about being on call and available for unexpected situations? https://t.co/1oWly1uDHc

@CoastalRunner79 @TLLairport @VilniusAirport By the information currently available to us, baggage will be forwared to Tallinn with late evening flight from London. For more details, we kindly advise to continue our conversation via private messages.

Once more - our sincere apologies for the inconveniences caused.

Congratulations to Latvian weightlifter Artūrs Plēsnieks who won a bronze Olympic medal! Latvia is very proud of your great achievement! Bringing home Olympic medalist was a very heartwarming experience for our team too! 🇱🇻 https://t.co/MGyODZFaUP

data.text: @caitilinokelly Hello! Passengers, who are holding an EU digital certificate or any kind of official document issued within EU/EEA/Switzerland/UK which confirms the completion of vaccination are not required to provide an negative test result. More details: https://t.co/W7BY4VZ5Rr

@CoastalRunner79 @TLLairport @VilniusAirport Hello! Please accept our apologies for this situation. Please know that majority of delayed bags are returned safely within a short period of time. Once your baggage has been located, our colleagues will contact you. You can follow the status here: https://t.co/d0uy2wThFa

@bigarbel Hello! Thanks for your question. To extend your gift voucher issued as a refund for Covid-19 cancelled flights, please proactively get in touch with our Reservations department! If you have already contacted them, they will get back to you once your voucher has been extended.

data.text: @Lachtoday Hello! We are sorry to hear about the inconveniences you have experienced in Amsterdam airport. May we ask you to share more details (your booking reference number) in a private message? We will check your particular situation. Thank you.

data.text: We continue ensuring the essential connectivity between Baltic capitals! This week we resumed direct flights between @TLLairport and @VilniusAirport. Currently two weekly flights are performed. See the flight schedule on https://t.co/iIdYuxTQZC https://t.co/t1LtLhRCs9

urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.
